description: This file defines a mock class 'BtmgrImplMock' for the 'BtmgrImpl' interface, used for testing Bluetooth manager functionalities via Google Mock. It declares mocked methods for Bluetooth adapter and device management operations.

classes.name: BtmgrImplMock
classes.description: Mock class implementing 'BtmgrImpl' interface, providing mock methods for Bluetooth management operations.

methods.name: ~BtmgrImplMock
methods.description: Destructor for the mock class, defaulted.

methods.name: BTRMGR_RegisterForCallbacks
methods.description: Mocks registration for callback functions.

methods.name: BTRMGR_UnRegisterFromCallbacks
methods.description: Mocks unregistration from callback functions.

methods.name: BTRMGR_GetNumberOfAdapters
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of number of Bluetooth adapters.

methods.name: BTRMGR_SetAdapterName
methods.description: Mocks setting the name of a Bluetooth adapter.

methods.name: BTRMGR_GetAdapterName
methods.description: Mocks getting the name of a Bluetooth adapter.

methods.name: BTRMGR_SetAdapterPowerStatus
methods.description: Mocks setting power status of Bluetooth adapter.

methods.name: BTRMGR_GetAdapterPowerStatus
methods.description: Mocks retrieving power status of Bluetooth adapter.

methods.name: BTRMGR_SetAdapterDiscoverable
methods.description: Mocks setting discoverable mode for Bluetooth adapter.

methods.name: BTRMGR_IsAdapterDiscoverable
methods.description: Mocks checking if Bluetooth adapter is discoverable.

methods.name: BTRMGR_StartDeviceDiscovery
methods.description: Mocks starting device discovery on an adapter.

methods.name: BTRMGR_StopDeviceDiscovery
methods.description: Mocks stopping device discovery.

methods.name: BTRMGR_GetDiscoveredDevices
methods.description: Mocks retrieving list of discovered devices.

methods.name: BTRMGR_PairDevice
methods.description: Mocks pairing with a device.

methods.name: BTRMGR_UnpairDevice
methods.description: Mocks unpairing from a device.

methods.name: BTRMGR_GetPairedDevices
methods.description: Mocks retrieving list of paired devices.

methods.name: BTRMGR_ConnectToDevice
methods.description: Mocks establishing connection to a device.

methods.name: BTRMGR_DisconnectFromDevice
methods.description: Mocks disconnecting from a device.

methods.name: BTRMGR_GetConnectedDevices
methods.description: Mocks retrieving connected devices.

methods.name: BTRMGR_GetDeviceProperties
methods.description: Mocks retrieving device properties.

methods.name: BTRMGR_StartAudioStreamingOut
methods.description: Mocks starting audio streaming out to a device.

methods.name: BTRMGR_StopAudioStreamingOut
methods.description: Mocks stopping audio streaming out.

methods.name: BTRMGR_SetAudioStreamingOutType
methods.description: Mocks setting audio streaming output type.

methods.name: BTRMGR_StartAudioStreamingIn
methods.description: Mocks starting audio streaming in from a device.

methods.name: BTRMGR_StopAudioStreamingIn
methods.description: Mocks stopping audio streaming in.

methods.name: BTRMGR_SetEventResponse
methods.description: Mocks setting event response.

methods.name: BTRMGR_MediaControl
methods.description: Mocks media control commands.

methods.name: BTRMGR_GetDeviceVolumeMute
methods.description: Mocks retrieving device volume and mute status.

methods.name: BTRMGR_SetDeviceVolumeMute
methods.description: Mocks setting device volume and mute status.

methods.name: BTRMGR_GetMediaTrackInfo
methods.description: Mocks retrieving media track info.

methods.name: BTRMGR_GetDeviceTypeAsString
methods.description: Mocks converting device type enum to string.

methods.name: BTRMGR_RegisterEventCallback
methods.description: Mocks registering event callback.
